actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 93-1062.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-899.

official_title: Concurrent resolution authorizing the printing of summaries of veterans legislation reported in the House and Senate during the 93rd Congress.

summary.text: Authorizes the printing of summaries of veterans legislation reported in the House and Senate during the Ninety-third Congress for use by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs of the House of Representatives, Members of the House of Representatives, and the Committee on Veterans' Affairs of the United States Senate.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution authorizing the printing of summaries of veterans legislation reported in the House and Senate during the 93rd Congress.
